channel.title: Wardens of the Amber Cage on Gembasher Studio

item.title: Alpha Build 2
item.description: A new build correcting some nasty bugs is available on the download page !

item.title: About Us
item.description: Gembasher Studio is a French video game studio based on Toulouse focusing on Virtual Reality games. We are currently working on our first public project : Wardens of the Amber Cage. Gembasher Studio Design/Developement Marc Debout Gaël Fenet-Garde Clément Lebrun Sound Design Guillaume Garroustet

item.title: Guide Wardens of the Amber Cage
item.description: User inputs Use Keybord/Mouse Xbox360 Pad Oculus Touch VIVE Wand Move Forward Move Backward Strafe Left Strafe Right Rotate Toward Left Rotate Toward Right Open Options Menu Main Attack Secondary Attack Teleport Spell Stunning Nova Combat Guide Main attack :

item.title: Website opening
item.description: We are proud to open this website and begin the public presentation of our project. We hope you to be as enthousiast as us :).
